svg.style: background: transparent; background-color: transparent; color-scheme: light dark;

path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(15, 15, 15), rgb(240, 240, 240)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(15, 15, 15), rgb(240, 240, 240));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 158px; height: 1px; padding-top: 40px; margin-left: 161px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #0F0F0F;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#0F0F0F, #F0F0F0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 320px; margin-left: 321px;
